author: bencos167
name: Radiosonde
short: Track radiosondes using the SondeHub API
description: A Red Discord bot cog that tracks radiosondes using the SondeHub V2 API. Features include tracking specific sondes, querying by location, viewing telemetry history, and listening to live updates.
install_msg: Thanks for installing Radiosonde! Use `[p]help sonde` to get started.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
